attributes.action: Call on the 1922 committee parliament conservative party leaders
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned with no voice, the 17million demand that the new PM listen to the will of brexit voters and not delay any longer article 50 or even put 72 in place now, with NO free movement.And to hold to account those who pushed andrea out.
attributes.background: We the people won a democratic vote.But yet the current government has ignored the will of the people .Without a single public vote you elected in a malice manner a remain campaigner to be our next PM.
